segments.text: Good morning , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I want to buy a lipstick for my wife because it is her birthday today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what color your wife often wears ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like this color or other colors ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like her to have a change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then how do you like this plum red one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is nice . Is it water proof ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'll take it . Could you help me gift wrap it ?
segments.speaker: S2
